Reviews.Title: “Offering my opinion so it could help someone to decide to stay at Hampton Inn Miami/Dadeland.”
Reviews.Author: Dalays V
Reviews.Content: stayed july 2008 chose price seemed reasonable plus reviews suggested good location reasonable place stay agree definitely well room quite small wasnt problem us air conditioning essential even mid july good nights sleep ability keep windows closed street noise first floor facing main street insect bites breakfast cold buffet fine didnt rate coffee highly far restaurants area concerned pizzeria roma ok seems bit overpriced definitely catering tourists better crossing bridge heading trattoria di excellent fairly priced catering trendy romans rather tourists nothing tourists places cater feel best avoided

Reviews.Title: “Courteous and attentive staff”
Reviews.Author: Rae T
Reviews.Content: girlfriend stayed hotel week early august 2007 great time room decent size comparable holiday inn room air conditioning buffet breakfast included quiet met needs great location minutes walk castel sant bus stop 3 feet door simple get anywhere town good location

Reviews.Title: “comfortable and good location”
Reviews.Author: jorgecancun
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights property room room size towels changed daily sheets one outlet bathroom charge camera ipod allowed safe mini room breakfast consisted variety pastries juice ham salami cheese cold cereal room temp yogurt staff brings coffee quickly internet guests entire time one quite sure nearest internet cafe internet worked fine staff front desk staff friendly helpful city buses 110 tour bus stop right outside door able get around city easily walked vatican spanish steps piazza navona colosseum front desk helpful telling us bus would get us restaurant next door nice coffee pastries hotel staff dinner right across street hotel

Reviews.Title: “I Like what I see..”
Reviews.Author: prisky
Reviews.Content: returned trip rome adjacent rooms clean comfortable rooms faced quiet street disturbed traffic noise breakfast cold buffet ample choice staff friendly hotel convenient great sights rome walked everywhere felt safe even night return rome definitely stay diplomatic hotel hotel taxi airport 60 euro walked taxi rank end road taxi 40 euro

Reviews.Title: “Clean and quiet”
Reviews.Author: AgentXman
Reviews.Content: chose hotel seemed good price convenience close centre city really well situated made rome easy breakfast quite simple good quality room comfortable bed firm toilet sewage smell despite nothing really seemed done resolve issue meant needed keep door shut room housekeeping okay never cleaned glasses used first floor bad luck meant lot noise early morning shop renovated hotel staff pleasant enough helpful marked overall rating okay due smell toilet couple minor housekeeping

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Stay with Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: tonic5080
Reviews.Content: stayed business visit good place close city crowded walking distance everywhere nice th restaurant good breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Great Choice”
Reviews.Author: ymid
Reviews.Content: hotel diplomatic great location near castel easy walking distance vatican spanish steps piazza del staff speak english well found polite helpful arrived morning able check room faced main street windows closed noise issue room normal european hotel size clean room deep bathtub shower breakfast good server bringing coffee drinks buffet included pastries ham cheese turn key front desk would leave hotel didnt problem since room modern electronic safe would consider staying

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Samsie
Reviews.Content: hotel great made stay rome excellent stayed road side 3 us slept wonderfully traffic issue us air conditioning worked bonus breakfast good also good choice cereals meats cheese pastries cakes yoghurts also great bus stops outside far walk piazza navona treat great time would stay

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Fran L
Reviews.Content: returned week rome staying diplomatic hotel via found reception helpful english speaking arrival given room front hotel dark asked moved sure enough next morning pack suitcases staff moved us room better standard shown trip advisor website also front hotel opens onto street could quite noisy early morning took tour bus 2nd day city found great help deciding wanted see get days walked 2 days got bus 4 euro one full day getting many times like real cheap way see rome beware pick pockets especially round bus buses thankfully werent one diplomatic central everything 10 mins vatican probably shops

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet and good price”
Reviews.Author: arusig
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel district within walking distance major attractions located next hall justice vatican side 510 minute walk vatican 15 minutes spanish steps room double large lovely morning complimentary continental breakfast served excellent espresso bus service directly front hotel however walked everywhere including walking metro station spanish steps luggage one case would definately recommend hotel would return future trips

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay on the south side of Miami! Good value. :-)”
Reviews.Author: New_friends_GR
Reviews.Content: diplomatic ideal place stay situated within easy walking distance sites near river around doesnt appeal want get bearings start literally walk door onto tour bus stops directly outside every minutes rooms extremely clean modern bathrooms long deep bath loved walking allow plenty time fill think true say front rooms slightly bigger back rooms quieter went march happy close window night opted space said tired every night could probably slept road heard traffic breakfasts excellent fruit yogurt juice bread cold meats variety delicious warm pastries oh best cappucino youll find anywhere rome theres bar restaurant got takeaway next door getting ready go evening time pastries nightcap dinner found several good eating places street opposite favourite ask friendly receptionist would recommend 2 ladies felt safe walking around area night cant write making next plane back stay diplomatic youll love

Reviews.Title: “Did not disappoint”
Reviews.Author: BahiaMakem
Reviews.Content: enjoy stay rome diplomatic hotel spent 3 days rome diplomatic hotel 3 stars hotel best friend days ago enjoyed hotel small nice heart city close every st peters church shopping area bars worked friendly help us us city attractions whole stay room clean ideal rest hope come back hotel diplomatic soon possible

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed my stay”
Reviews.Author: buktrvlr
Reviews.Content: firstly couldnt believe value money hotel friend booked twin room three nights fri sat great price per night room including buffet continental breakfast hotel located north river five minute walk vatican 5 mins spanish steps two metro stations within mins walk take parts city bus stop right outside front door room clean comfortable bathroom clean towels replaced daily would expect breakfast continental style included juices cereals tea coffee ham cheese salami fresh bread rolls yoghurt fruit salad also dutch toast choice breakfast room spacious staff polite reception small tasteful reception staff polite helpful also english speaking helps would recommend hotel certainly money paid found fault would looked travelled rome watch match despite fact lost great time

Reviews.Title: “Very well located for shopping and near to airport, nice breakfast”
Reviews.Author: HernanRestrepo
Reviews.Content: stayed two hotel friendly helpful staff room fair size minibar nice continental breakfast great location sites vatican city walk lots shops bars nearby across road hotel great place eat friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Our wedding weekend”
Reviews.Author: Chris H
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights beginning feb found hotel good location spanish steps 10 min walk st peters square vatican around 15 mins staff helpful rooms little small maybe clean complaint would found little noisy mornings 730 sounded whole hotel outside room chat however think noisy neighbours overall nice enough hotel decent location offering good value money

Reviews.Title: “Based on my cost Very Good Value”
Reviews.Author: mathieuissa
Reviews.Content: hotel great location nice area close vatican well main shopping area lots restaurants rooms average size modern spotlessly clean dont expect much view though looked closed courtyard least quiet reception efficient friendly cheerful breakfast alot choice fine restaurant bar hotel nice coffee house along street heating seemed centrally controlled may hot cold room people fine us overall good value 110 euro night would definately stay

Reviews.Title: “As usual, a great experience!”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights 14 18 december 2006 location good perfect rooms ok really central heating could turn breakfast bad stuff really rude planning visit rome try find hotel closer spanish steps navona square better say diplomatic hotel average hotel

Reviews.Content: mother stayed diplomatic 4 nights 4th july wonderful time hotel extremely clean airy rooms larger would expect bathrooms beautiful cool marble air conditioning almost silent patio centre hotel table chairs cool umbrellas attached breakfast room serving good continental breakfast pleasant staff front desk staff speak perfect english particular wonderful keen football roman history us whilst waited excellent door door tours arranged us tours took ease heat thoroughly recommend hotel however arrive taxi drivers strike never clear chose take strike action made us use public transport start intended take taxi ciampino familiar public transportation system probably blessing route diplomatic clear easy bearing mind taxi airport taxi strike taxis holding people charging double normal fares numerous airport termini charging one way return termini incl easyjet airport termini buy day ticket allow travel buses trams metro termini take either 70 bus directly hotel take metro line walk via diplomatic nine buses stop outside hotel 70 available public transport ticket hoponhopoff private 110 refused use taxis rome public transport wherever ended walked rome simply looked one many bus stops guaranteed bus get us back hotel members recommended ristorante la agreed best first course buffet ever good went back main course hope review help

Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel much location splendid rooms comfy nice unlike reviewers actually enjoyed breakfast especially different cream rome romans starting breakfast right trip piazza around corner recommended find excellent restaurants

Reviews.Content: took short break rome 4 days found hotel diplomatic within good short distance main attractions spanish steps vatican staff friendly helpful although spend much time room busy walking everywhere found room comfortable clean little small side price bargain nonetheless breakfast really quite limited could improve aspect service stayed 20 years ago much changed aint broke dont fix

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT gathering spot for family wedding”

Reviews.Content: hotel lovely short pleasant walk vatican spanish steps attractions rooms nice marble bathrooms perfect cleanliness excellent maid service attentive staff mother never forget assistance front desk kept leave open also arranged train tickets us make day trip florence gave us specific directions go stations florence ive never wonderful personal assistance hotel staff would return diplomatic choosing hotel downside hotel tend move later arrivals elsewhere move another hotel get quality hotel could easily make four stars understand choose three star rating

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights king suite spacious bed comfortable bathroom good size tv good selection channels internet worked well excellent gym good couple machines also weights breakfast excellent great selection pastries breads waffle machine hot buffet egg bacon sausage yoghurt coffeetea complimentary apples nice touch front desk staff excellent manager amazing never met someone speak many languages place busy never problems finding car park bonus hotel close dadeland shopping mall location wise central places wanted visit took 30 minutes get south beach 60 minutes reach next miami trip return hotel

Reviews.Content: significant vacation visiting miami area november 2011 chose stay hilton properties hilton points chose stay miami thought dadeland property gave us bang buck wasnt hard find hotel us 1 really close dadeland mall chance visit youre staying hotel youre driving toward downtown miami nice easy drive weekend stayed traffic lights us 1 quite nicely drive getting downtown checkin process breeze room 4th floor nice clean comfortable love staying beds comfortable particular hampton exception breakfast excellent lots good foods hot cold choose cheese waffles sausage course fresh fruit yogurt cereal cheese amazing loved breakfast area could sit inside outside outside particularly sunny florida morning hampton outdoor pool hot tub able take advantage hot tub one evening nice pool area although main pool bit chilly us use night everything room worked well satisfied checkout process also easy would definitely enjoy staying ever chance highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “The hospitality and service was excellent.”

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great price, great location”

Reviews.Content: usually dont write reviews hotels unless stand reason good bad writing one excellent service received staff way keys trip lined half day trip miami stayed hotel found great location restaurants also mall cant comment mall drove front desk staff helpful ways would definitely stay

Reviews.Content: husband stayed hampton inn night cruise port miami conveniently located next dadeland mall adjacent downtown area warmly greeted manager alfonso quickly checked us us band back super attentive arranging shuttle take us dinner great local restaurant initially around taking train south warned us wouldnt great idea evening appreciated concern safety never miami suggested local music want catch show made sure transportation evening freshly baked cookies hotel guest nice little touch hotel extremely clean good sized rooms staff also attentive pleasant morning breakfast spread fresh variety foods choose eating went check pool swim checking clean cared ample amount towels staff person stuck head back door asked guest like coffee thought super thoughtful talk going extra mile check alfonso informed us shuttle van company fees port miami hotel would charge us half original price stay light take cab nice touch considering cost taxi crazy overall wonderful stay id highly recommend hotel bed pleasant sleep attentive staff
